  3. Devotion

What book is The movie Devotion based on?

The movieDevotion is based on the bookDevotionwritten by  Mindy Kaplan

Devotion 1/1/1995

"See the movie...Read the book...Find out everything about thirty-five-year old Sheila Caston, the nightclub comedian whose career is just about to take off into television's stratosphere, and her devoted partner, painter-sculptor Julie Rosen. Lynn Webster and her business partner-husband are the producers of a groundbreaking show about a gay character in which they plan to star Sheila. The problem is that Lynn, fourteen years married, has some history with Sheila. Some very intimate history she's looking to rekindle. But Sheila is happy with long-term partner Julie. And Sheila has never forgiven -- nor gotten over -- the beautiful Lynn, and wants no part of that renewing pain. But then Lynn "buys" an auction date with Sheila...And suddenly Sheila and Julie find that Sheila's professional future is very much on the line -- as well as their own future together."-- Publisher's description.

1/1/1995

The Girl Next Door

written byMindy Kaplan

1/1/1996

Kabbalah Month by Month

written byMindy Ribner

Published by Jossey-Bass - 8/29/2002

Presents a month-by-month guide to the ancient wisdom of the Kabbalah through soul stories, meditations, spiritual and psychological guidelines, kabbalistic teachings, and practical recommendations.

Did you know that the movie Devotion is based on the book Devotion?

An openly gay star on the standup comedy circuit gets a shot at her own TV sitcom, but the offer has serious strings attatched. A ghost from her past threatens not only her professional future, but her relationship with her live-in-lover of four years. A love triangle with a lesbian twist.

  • Internet Movie Database:  5.9/10

Do you want to have more information about Devotion, or tell what you think about the book adaptation? Leave a comment.
